title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies Based on Trustworthy Experience for Online Language Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Secondary language teachers acquiring trust-based collaborative strategies to design effective online lectures in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Participants can apply a three-stage self-assessment framework to build self-trust during instructional design processes
Participants can design a needs analysis process using semi-structured interview techniques to build trust with faculty
Participants can create a content development checklist reflecting organizational trust when designing lectures
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
